basics.name: Prasanna Kumar
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I've started my career at startup so I am use to wearing many hats. I am a very product focussed developer who prioritizes user feedback first and foremost. I'm generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

work.name: OpenText
highlights: Build microservice backend with Java and SpringBoot.
Build widget based SmartUI app with Backbone.js, RequireJs (AMD).
Cross framework solution to embed components created by modern frameworks.
Create re-usable standalone web components.
Used Figma for design and UX work.
Optimizing page loading performance using caching, pre-fetch, compression and other techniques.
Lead an agile team
Perform peer reviews
Jasmine, Karma, Mockito, JIRA, GitLab CI/CD, CloudFoundry, Docker
work.summary: OpenText is a Canadian enterprise product company that develops and sells enterprise information management software and other add-ons around information management. Contributed to building content management service under OT2 cloud services

work.name: OpenText
highlights: Java
SpringBoot
Angular
BackboneJs

work.name: PurpleTalk
highlights: Design and develop tenant-based architecture based on Spring, Hibernate, Postgres, Redis
Develop bot framework based on MSBotFramework and DialogFlow
Handle client communications and be the POC for clients.
Create prototypes for sales and promotional activities.
Built micro service based RESTful APIs using Java, AWS for IOT apps
Create hybrid mobile apps using Ionic
Postgres, Ionic2, Cordova, Sequelize
work.summary: PurpleTalk is an IT services, mobile application and game development company. I have contributed wide variety of projects at PurpleTalk right from created backend services using SprintBoot, NodeJs, Micro services, and hybrid mobile apps using Iconic.

work.name: Vimukti Technologies

work.summary: Vimukti Technologies is startup organization committed to building enterprise softwares

education.institution: The Institution of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineers (IETE)

courses: SDECP - Spl. Diploma in Electronics with Specialization in Computer Engg.

references.name: vijay krishna
references.reference: Got an oppurtunity to work with prasanna, such a wonderful guy to work with, technical enthusiast ,passionate coder,I personally appreciate his willingness to invent and innovate always approachable.He is very versatile , can adopt to any conditions and align himself to get the job done.He is an achiever ,diligent always open to learn new things ,keep experiementing, way to go!!!  cheers Prasanna

references.name: Nagaraju Palla
references.reference: He is most talented person, and he had lot of patience on explain any concept. I feel more comfortable to work with him.

references.name: Lingarao Rajavarapu
references.reference: Prasanna Kumar has excellent Programming skills. He is proactive in every front and yet process oriented. He handled both good times and turbulent times with equal dexterity. It is a wonderful experience working with Him
